string.text:
an explosive consisting of a powdered mixture of saltpetre, sulphur, and charcoal, now chiefly used for quarry blasting and in fuses and fireworks.

Ammo needs to be stored in a cool, temperature-controlled environment. An ammo case will protect your ammo from extreme heat, cold, moisture or dust.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:

the primer is the chemical and/or device responsible for initiating the propellant combustion that will push the projectiles out of the gun barrel.
 
 %c[ui_gray_1]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_blue] � %c[ui_gray_2] craft materials

A bullet is a kinetic projectile, a component of firearm ammunition that is shot from a gun barrel.
